main.main-text: We create cutting-edge IT solutions and powerful marketing strategies that help businesses grow and develop. Uzit Group is the synergy of technology and creativity, leading Uzbekistan into the digital future.

about.title: About us
about.subtitle:
Uzit Group is a team of professionals in the field of IT 
 and marketing, combining technology and creativity to drive business growth. 
 We create innovative digital solutions, develop marketing strategies, 
 and help companies reach new heights.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Check out our flexible rates offering a variety of partnership options. Regardless of your budget or project size, we are ready to provide high-quality IT solutions and digital marketing services. Our tariffs are customized for different needs, ensuring effective communication and mutually beneficial cooperation. Develop with UZIT Group - your reliable partner in the world of technology.

stages.title: Development Stages
stages.subtitle: Software product development is a complex and multi-stage process that starts with the problem statement. At the analysis stage, user requirements are defined, and design includes the development of the product structure and architecture. The development team then implements the code and performs rigorous testing to identify and fix bugs. After successful completion of testing, the product is implemented into the working environment. An important step is maintenance, which includes training users and providing technical support. The whole process is aimed at creating an efficient and high-quality software product that meets the tasks and needs of customers

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.mainTitle1:
What is digital business marketing
and why is it important for my business?
FAQ.answer1:
Digital marketing is the promotion or advertising of your product, service or business online or through the internet. 
 Depending on the type of business, goals, or what stage 
 the business is in the life cycle, efforts may vary.
 It is important to work with a marketing team that understands your goals and knows 
 how to create a comprehensive strategy to be able to 
 identify the most profitable channels.
FAQ.mainTitle2: How can I start my business with UZIT Group?
FAQ.answer2:
1.Click the “Contact Us” button at the top of the screen and send us a message via the online form.
2.Email us at uzitgroup@gmail.com.
3.Call us at +998(33)233 -80-80. 
Contacting UZIT Group will be worth your time. At a minimum, you will be able to speak 
 with our experienced professionals and gain insight into your company's marketing capabilities 
 and how you can benefit from digital marketing and advertising services.
FAQ.mainTitle3: What type of content marketing does UZIT Group offer?
FAQ.answer3:
UZIT Group offers all different types of content marketing including 
 but not limited to: blog post writing, guest blog writing,
 article writing, SEO content writing, video creation, email campaigns and much, much more.
FAQ.mainTitle4: Is it possible to order individual services from us?
FAQ.answer4: Yes. You can order all types of services from us separately. But only what we do.
FAQ.answer5:
Depending on the selected services. The customer must provide a completed brief,
 logo (if available), contact numbers and email.

questions.title: Any questions?
questions.subtitle: We will definitely contact you within a certain time. You can also ask questions in our telegram bot

main.titleWhite: From Mental Arithmetic to Creating Solutions!
main.subtitle: Brain in shape, skills at the top

front.name: Front-End
front.des: They make IT products modern and attractive, creating interfaces for websites and applications. Frontend courses in Samarkand will help you master this profession and open doors to work in IT, including remote projects.

back.name: Back-End
back.des: The course 'Backend: The Heart of Modern Websites' in Samarkand will teach you to create powerful server solutions. Master a profession that opens up opportunities to work on serious IT projects, including remotely.

matem.name: Mathematics
matem.des: From the basics to mastery! Our course covers everything from basic arithmetic to complex equations. We explain in simple language, show how to apply knowledge in practice, and teach you to think logically.

eng.name: English language
eng.des: Step by step to free communication! On the course we pay attention to everything: from grammar and expanding vocabulary to practicing conversational skills. The training is designed so that you find it interesting, easy and effective.

rus.name: Russian language
rus.des: Step by step to free communication! On the course we pay attention to everything: from grammar and expanding vocabulary to practicing conversational skills. The training is designed so that you find it interesting, easy and effective.

help.title: We will help you solve all your questions
help.subtitle: If you want to learn more about UZITGroup or have any questions, you can leave a request and we will call you back to provide the necessary information.
